name: The legendary Tri-Blade known as 'Bloodhunter' <tm> (1h)
data: It has magnificent weapon class for its type (nice in general).
It increases the users strength a bit.
It does magical damage a good amount.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
This weapon will increase the users strength.
This weapon will increase the ability to hit
This weapon does more damage than usual
This weapon will increase the users power.
